p: In C. elegans, daf-2, tub-1, ctl-2, hsp-16.1, hsp-16.2 are required for Insulin/IGF-1 signaling pathway [ 31]. In C. elegans, this pathway plays a key role in the regulation of development, metabolism and aging, and is the most detailed life-regulating pathway in current research [ 32]. We found the expression change of these genes (Fig. 3c, d), it may be related to the reduced lifespan of C. elegans.
